Resources/Additions

Bob wants 3GB of RAM, 30GB of storage and 4 total backup slots.
6x$1.50=$9 for the 3GB RAM
30x$0.25=$7.50 for the 30GB storage
$2 for the additional backup slot requested to results in 4 TOTAL backup slots (since 3 are already included).
Which would brings us to $18.50/month OR at a decently discounted $166.55/year

Panel Operations such as but not limited to start/stop/restarting, changing versioning(s), replacing service types (service eggs), setting up schedule(s) and so on where/if possible. Are able to be requested or done on your side (as applicable).

Best Efforts General Support Services Everything from remote manual backups’ restorations to game/application’s configurations to individual requests/needs I will happily see what I can do.

Terms
